name: Notion Website Builder
description:
Notion is a great tool for notes and documents but it is also great for building a website! 


This file pairs with the Notion Website Builder Template. The Notion template will help you build a website on Notion quickly and easily. 

This file includes: 

  • Components for icons and cover
  • Color branding
  • A workspace with a how-to guide


You can find the Notion template here
